title: WSJ News Exclusive | Moderna to Study Its Covid-19 Vaccine in Babies as Young as 3 Months
author: Peter Loftus
description: As many as 700 infants would be enrolled in an effort to test the appropriate dose level for infants 3 months to 6 months old.
cleaned_text: June 15, 2022 2:50 pm ET Moderna Inc. is planning to test its Covid-19 vaccine in babies 3 months to 6 months old, the youngest age group studied to date.
